core.security.certificate

Class Certificate

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.security.certificate.CertificateAbstract
      • core.security.certificate.Certificate

  • public class Certificate
extends CertificateAbstract
    Class represents certificates to generate. Static field - CERTIFICATES_PATH - should be change every time when system is replaced!
    Author:
    Mateusz Mucha

    • Method Detail

      • generateCertificate

        public void generateCertificate(java.lang.String certOwner,
                                java.lang.String initials,
                                int yearsValidity,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Method to generate certificate.
        Parameters:
        certOwner - - owner name
        initials - - initials of owner
        yearsValidity - - how many years certificate is valid
        password - - password for certiciate

      • validateCertificate

        public boolean validateCertificate(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   java.lang.String alias)
        Method to validate if certificate is signatured by root certificate, if belongs to owner and if is valid.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - - stream with certificate
        password - - password for certiciate
        alias - - alias of certificate
        Returns:
        1 if is valid, 0 if not

      • createSignedCertificate

        private java.security.cert.X509Certificate createSignedCertificate(java.security.cert.X509Certificate cetrificate,
                                                                   java.security.cert.X509Certificate issuerCertificate,
                                                                   java.security.PrivateKey issuerPrivateKey)
        Method to create signed certificate to root.
        Parameters:
        cetrificate - - certificate to signed
        issuerCertificate - - issuer certificate
        issuerPrivateKey - - issuer private key
        Returns:
        signed X509 certificate to root

      • buildAlias

        private java.lang.String buildAlias(java.lang.String certOwner)
        Method to build alias from owner name
        Parameters:
        certOwner - - certificate owner
        Returns:
        alias of owner for certificate
